Article.Title: Notification obligation regarding rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing

Content.Obligation: The controller shall communicate any rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing.

Recipients.Definition: Each recipient to whom the personal data have been disclosed.
Recipients.Conditions: Unless this proves impossible or involves disproportionate effort.

DataSubjectInformation.Requirement: The controller shall inform the data subject about those recipients.
DataSubjectInformation.Condition: If the data subject requests it.
